resources.string: I am 40, Am I too old to learn User Experience?
It will at least take me a year to learn User Experience
Learning User Experience will cost a lot of money
I do need a coding experience to learn User Experience
Is there a community of User Interface/User Experience designers in Nigeria
Do you like this app and it will give you a feedback

No, You’re never too old to become a UX Designer.If you want to become a UX designer and you don’t have a background in digital, don’t panic. The learning curve is steep, but it’s doable. Getting into UX design completely changed my life.
No,I am 9 Months Old as a UX Designer .I love being in this UX design filded. I got my first UX job at Studio Flolab.I want to make useful things that can solve problem for many people out there
yes, 7 Reasons Why You Should Get Into UX Design
No, Learn UX design: 16 best paid and free UX design courses
No, 5 Simple Steps to Land a Job as UX Designer with No Experience

Yes, Whether you’re completely new to UX, or a professional in the field looking for tips, joining an online community is a great place to ask for possible solutions, stay on top of trends, and connect with others with a common interest!
